Question
========

To fix a microwave oven you need time X. The distribution of the random variable X has a mean of 1 hour with a standard deviation of 1 hour. Your company has 80 such microwaves. What then is the probability that the average repair job takes longer than 50 minutes?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,06
* 0,80
* 0,83
* 0,94

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.06: Incorrect
* 0.80: Incorrect
* 0.83: Incorrect
* 0.94: Correct
